name: act
trans: v. 行动；表现；起作用；扮演（角色）；担任；假装；代理 n. 行为；假装；某种行为（或常规等）；法令；判决书；会议记录；（戏剧等的）幕；表演；演出团体 abbr. 活跃的 (active)；演员 (actor)；实际的 (actual)

sentences.english: The company acted correctly in sacking him.
sentences.chinese: 公司解雇他做得对。

sentences.english: The jury decided that Walker had acted in self-defence.
sentences.chinese: 陪审团裁定沃克的行为属于自卫。

sentences.english: Politicians will only act when enough people demand that they do something.
sentences.chinese: 只有足够多的民众起来要求，政客们才会采取行动。

sentences.english: The padding acts as a cushion if the player falls or is hit by the ball.
sentences.chinese: 万一球员摔倒或者被球击中，衬垫可以起到缓冲作用。

sentences.english: The new president’s first act should be to end the war.
sentences.chinese: 新总统的第一步行动应当是结束战争。

detailed_translations.english: to do something in a particular way or for a particular reason
one thing that you do

name: bike
trans: n. 自行车；脚踏车 vi. 骑自行车（或摩托车） n. (Bike)人名；(土、土库、塞)比克

sentences.english: Let’s go for a bike ride.
sentences.chinese: 我们去骑会儿自行车吧。

sentences.english: She bikes to work every day.
sentences.chinese: 她每天骑自行车上班。

detailed_translations.english: a bicycle
to ride a bicycle

name: dance
trans: n. 舞蹈；舞会；舞曲 vi. 跳舞；跳跃；飘扬 vt. 跳舞；使跳跃 adj. 舞蹈的；用于跳舞的 n. (Dance)人名；(英)丹斯；(法)当斯

sentences.english: Come on, let’s dance.
sentences.chinese: 来吧，我们跳舞吧。

sentences.english: The words danced before her tired eyes.
sentences.chinese: 这些字在她疲乏的眼前晃动。

sentences.english: The waltz is an easy dance to learn.
sentences.chinese: 华尔兹这种舞很容易学。

detailed_translations.english: to move your body to the sound and rhythm of music
a special set of movements performed to a particular type of music

name: play
trans: vt. 游戏；扮演；演奏；播放；同…比赛 vi. 演奏；玩耍；上演；参加比赛 n. 游戏；比赛；剧本 n. (Play)人名；(法、瑞典)普莱

sentences.english: Kids were playing and chasing each other.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在互相追逐嬉闹。

sentences.english: He’s learning to play the piano.
sentences.chinese: 他在学习弹钢琴。

detailed_translations.english: when children play, they do things that they enjoy, often with other people or with toys

name: sing
trans: vi. 唱歌；歌颂；鸣叫；呼号 vt. 唱；用诗赞颂；唱着使 n. 演唱；鸣声；呼啸声 n. (Sing)人名；(老、德、泰)辛

sentences.english: She can sing beautifully.
sentences.chinese: 她唱歌很好听。

sentences.english: Most children enjoy singing.
sentences.chinese: 大多数孩子都喜欢唱歌。

sentences.english: We had a great time singing some of the old songs .
sentences.chinese: 我们唱了一些老歌，非常开心。

sentences.english: I’ve never been able to sing in tune (= sing the correct notes ) .
sentences.chinese: 我唱歌总是跑调。

sentences.english: She patiently sang the baby to sleep .
sentences.chinese: 她耐心地唱歌哄宝宝入睡。

detailed_translations.english: to produce a musical sound with your voice

name: study
trans: n. 学习，研究；课题；书房；学问 vt. 学习；考虑；攻读；细察 vi. 研究；用功 n. (Study)人名；(英)斯塔迪

sentences.english: Recent studies show that women still get paid a lot less than men.
sentences.chinese: 最近的调查表明，女性的薪水仍比男性的要低很多。

sentences.english: The study was carried out between January and May 2008.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究是在 2008 年1月到5月间进行的。

sentences.english: Set aside a period of time specifically for study.
sentences.chinese: 留出一段时间专门用于学习

sentences.english: I’ve been studying English for six years
sentences.chinese: 我学英语已有六年了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 研究 (对某一课题或问题的)；中文释义: 学习 (尤指在家里或放学后的)
detailed_translations.english: a piece of work that is done to find out more about a particular subject or problem, and usually includes a written report

detailed_translations.chinese: 中文释义: 学习，攻读
detailed_translations.english: to learn about a subject at school, university etc

name: build
trans: vt. 建立；建筑 vi. 建筑；建造 n. 构造；体形；体格

sentences.english: The purpose is to build new houses for local people.
sentences.chinese: 目的是要为当地居民建造新的住宅。

sentences.english: The road took many years to build.
sentences.chinese: 这条路修了好几年。

sentences.english: They needed $3 million to build the bridge.
sentences.chinese: 他们需要300万美元来修建这座桥。

sentences.english: It is the female birds that build the nests.
sentences.chinese: 筑巢的是雌鸟。

sentences.english: She had built a reputation as a criminal lawyer.
sentences.chinese: 她已经树立起了刑事诉讼律师的声望。

sentences.english: She’s been busy building her career.
sentences.chinese: 她忙于创建自己的事业。

detailed_translations.english: to make something, especially a building or something large

name: color
trans: n. 颜色；肤色；颜料；脸色 vt. 粉饰；给...涂颜色；歪曲 vi. 变色；获得颜色

sentences.english: What color dress did you buy?
sentences.chinese: 你买的连衣裙是什么颜色的？

sentences.english: jams that contain no artificial colors or preservatives
sentences.chinese: 不含人工色素和防腐剂的果酱

detailed_translations.english: red, blue, yellow, green, brown, purple etc

name: dress
trans: n. 连衣裙；（特定种类的）衣服 v. （给……）穿衣；穿正式服装；为……提供服装；清理包扎（伤口）；装饰；加工，处理（食材、木材等）；使排列整齐’；设计（发型） n. (Dress) （美、巴）德雷斯（人名）

sentences.english: a gentleman in evening dress
sentences.chinese: 穿晚礼服的绅士

sentences.english: The play was performed in modern dress (= clothes from the present time ) .
sentences.chinese: 这出戏里演员是现代装束。

detailed_translations.english: clothes for men or women of a particular type or for a particular occasion

name: listen
trans: vi. 听，倾听；听从，听信 n. 听，倾听

sentences.english: Listen! There’s a strange noise in the engine.
sentences.chinese: 听！引擎发出奇怪的声音。

sentences.english: I told him not to go, but he just wouldn’t listen.
sentences.chinese: 我叫他不要去，可他就是不听。

detailed_translations.english: to pay attention to what someone is saying or to a sound that you can hear

name: myself
trans: pron. 我自己；我亲自；我的正常的健康状况和正常情绪

sentences.english: I blame myself for what has happened.
sentences.chinese: 发生这一切都怪我自己。

sentences.english: I can look after myself.
sentences.chinese: 我可以照顾好自己。

sentences.english: I’m making myself a sandwich.
sentences.chinese: 我在给自己做三明治。

detailed_translations.english: used by the person speaking or writing to show that they are affected by their own action

name: think
trans: vt. 想；认为；想起；想像；打算 vi. 想；认为 n. 想；想法 adj. 思想的

sentences.english: I thought I heard something.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我听到了什么声音。

sentences.english: He didn’t think anyone would believe him.
sentences.chinese: 他觉得没人会相信他。

sentences.english: Do you think I should call him?
sentences.chinese: 你认为我应该打电话给他吗？

sentences.english: For some reason, I keep thinking it’s Friday today.
sentences.chinese: 不知为什么，我总觉得今天是周五。

sentences.english: The recession lasted longer than anyone thought it would.
sentences.chinese: 谁也没有想到这次经济萧条会持续这么久。

sentences.english: Am I right in thinking that you have a brother?
sentences.chinese: 我想你是有个兄弟的，对吗？

sentences.english: I can’t help thinking that he’s made a mistake.
sentences.chinese: 我总觉得他弄错了。

sentences.english: Do you honestly think I would do something so stupid?
sentences.chinese: 你真认为我会做这么愚蠢的事吗？

sentences.english: We must start thinking in terms of reducing costs.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须开始考虑降低成本了。

detailed_translations.english: to have a particular opinion or to believe that something is true
to think about a problem or question

name: bright
trans: adj. 明亮的，鲜明的；聪明的；愉快的 adv. 明亮地；光明地；欢快地 n. 车头灯光 n. (Bright)人名；(英)布赖特

sentences.english: Her eyes were hurting from the bright lights.
sentences.chinese: 明亮的光线刺痛了她的眼睛。

sentences.english: bright sunshine
sentences.chinese: 灿烂的阳光

sentences.english: a large bright room
sentences.chinese: 明亮的大房间

sentences.english: He was an exceptionally bright child.
sentences.chinese: 他是个特别聪明的孩子。

detailed_translations.english: shining strongly, or with plenty of light

name: cave
trans: n. 山洞，洞穴；窑洞 v. 塌落；屈服；洞穴探险；挖洞穴 int. （旧，校园俚语）当心 n. (Cave) （美、爱）凯夫（人名）

sentences.english: the entrance to a cave
sentences.chinese: 洞穴的入口

detailed_translations.chinese: 使凹陷，使塌落；在…挖洞穴
detailed_translations.english: to hollow out
a large natural hole in the side of a cliff or hill, or under the ground

name: crystal
trans: n. 结晶，晶体；水晶；水晶饰品 adj. 水晶的；透明的，清澈的 n. (Crystal)人名；(英)克里斯特尔，克丽丝特尔 (女名)

sentences.english: ice/salt crystals
sentences.chinese: 冰 / 盐的结晶体

sentences.english: a pair of crystal earrings
sentences.chinese: 一对水晶耳环

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of a substance with many even sides, that is formed naturally when the substance becomes solid

name: drawing
trans: n. 图画；牵引；素描术 v. 绘画；吸引（draw的ing形式）；拖曳

sentences.english: a drawing of Canterbury Cathedral
sentences.chinese: 一幅坎特伯雷大教堂的素描画

sentences.english: I’ve never been very good at drawing.
sentences.chinese: 我向来不擅长画图。

detailed_translations.english: a picture that you draw with a pencil, pen etc

name: sharp
trans: adj. 急剧的；锋利的；强烈的；敏捷的；刺耳的 adv. 急剧地；锐利地；突然地 n. 尖头 vt. 磨快；把音调升高 vi. 升音演奏 n. (Sharp)人名；(英)夏普

sentences.english: Make sure you use a good sharp knife.
sentences.chinese: 你一定要用锋利的好刀。

sentences.english: Its teeth are razor sharp (= very sharp ) .
sentences.chinese: 它的牙齿非常锋利。

sentences.english: Do not cross the bridge but turn sharp left to go down on to the towpath.
sentences.chinese: 不要过桥，而是向左急转下到纤道上去。

detailed_translations.chinese: 急剧的；锋利的；强烈的；敏捷的；刺耳的
detailed_translations.english: having a very thin edge or point that can cut things easily
Sharp is also an adverb

name: shiny
trans: adj. 光滑的，有光泽的，闪亮的

sentences.english: shiny black shoes
sentences.chinese: 锃亮的黑皮鞋

sentences.english: a shiny polished table
sentences.chinese: 擦得光亮的桌子

sentences.english: Her hair was thick and shiny.
sentences.chinese: 她的头发浓密且有光泽。

detailed_translations.english: smooth and bright

name: cattle
trans: n. 牛；牲畜（骂人的话）；家畜；无价值的人 n. (Cattle)人名；(意)卡特莱

sentences.english: herds of cattle
sentences.chinese: 成群的牛

sentences.english: a cattle rancher
sentences.chinese: 牧牛场场主

detailed_translations.english: cows and  bulls  kept on a farm for their meat or milk

name: caution
trans: n. 小心，谨慎；警告，警示 vt. 警告

sentences.english: The physician must exercise caution when prescribing antidepressants.
sentences.chinese: 医师在开抗抑郁药处方时必须谨慎。

sentences.english: Business leaders are cautioning against hasty action that would hamper flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 企业领导人被告诫不要贸然采取行动，以免把事情搞僵。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being very careful to avoid danger or risks
to warn someone that something might be dangerous, difficult etc

name: elephant
trans: n. 象；大号图画纸

sentences.english: A trunk distinguishes the elephant.
sentences.chinese: 长鼻是象的特征。

sentences.english: So the part of the elephant I experience applies what we know about people and how we apply that to UX design.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我体验的那部分的大象就是我们对人的了解和我们将我们的了解应用于用户体验设计。

sentences.english: Tom: No.Although 75% of its raw materials is elephant dung, it is light delicate fragrance instead of stink. This is due to its special fabrication technology.
sentences.chinese: 不，尽管这种纸里75％的原料都是大象的粪便，但它不但不臭，反而有一种淡淡的清香，这是源于它的特殊的制造工艺。

detailed_translations.english: a very large grey animal with four legs, two tusks(= long curved teeth ) and a trunk(= long nose ) that it can use to pick things up

name: kangaroo
trans: n. 袋鼠

sentences.english: The kangaroo has a problem.
sentences.chinese: 这只袋鼠有一个难题。

sentences.english: This is the kangaroo from Australia.
sentences.chinese: 这是一只来自澳洲的袋鼠。

sentences.english: Thanks to special bacteria in their stomachs, kangaroo flatulence contains no methane and scientists want to transfer that bacteria to cattle and sheep who emit large quantities of the harmful gas.
sentences.chinese: 袋鼠胃中有一种特殊的细菌能使其放的屁中不含有甲烷。 科学家想将这种细菌移至牛羊的胃中，以抑制它们所排放的大量有害气体。

detailed_translations.english: an Australian animal that moves by jumping and carries its babies in a pouch (= a special pocket of skin ) on its stomach

name: turtle
trans: n. 龟，甲鱼；海龟 n. (Turtle)人名；(英)特特尔

sentences.english: ...a pet turtle.
sentences.chinese: …一只宠物龟。

detailed_translations.english: a  reptile  that lives mainly in water and has a soft body covered by a hard shell

name: watch
trans: vt. 观察；注视；看守；警戒 n. 手表；监视；守护；值班人 vi. 观看，注视；守侯，看守

sentences.english: Do you mind if I watch?
sentences.chinese: 你介意我看着吗？

sentences.english: We sat and watched the sunset.
sentences.chinese: 我们坐下来看日落。

sentences.english: Ruth could not bear to watch her parents arguing.
sentences.chinese: 露丝看不得父母争吵。

sentences.english: Most parents don’t know what their kids are watching on TV.
sentences.chinese: 大多数父母不知道自己的孩子都在看什么电视节目。

detailed_translations.english: to look at someone or something for a period of time, paying attention to what is happening
a small clock that you wear on your wrist or keep in your pocket

name: armor
trans: n. 盔甲；装甲，防弹钢板；装甲部队，装甲车辆；（动物或植物的）保护外层；（感情、社交等的）防御 v. 为……装甲；为……提供（感情等的）防御 n. (Armor) （美、英、法）阿莫尔（人名）

sentences.english: The leading role in the film is costumed in medieval armor.
sentences.chinese: 影片中的主角穿着中古时代的甲胄。

sentences.english: This Courtly Poetry came out of the idea of chivalry and courtly love that you might associate with knights in shining armor.
sentences.chinese: 这首宫廷诗取材于骑士精神和典雅爱恋，你可能会想到这与身穿闪光的盔甲的骑士有关。

name: feather
trans: n. 羽毛 vt. 用羽毛装饰 vi. 长羽毛 n. (Feather)人名；(英)费瑟

sentences.english: an ostrich feather
sentences.chinese: 一根鸵鸟羽毛

detailed_translations.english: one of the light soft things that cover a bird’s body

name: scale
trans: n. 规模；比例；鳞；刻度；天平；数值范围 vi. 衡量；攀登；剥落；生水垢 vt. 测量；攀登；刮鳞；依比例决定 n. (Scale)人名；(意)斯卡莱

sentences.english: A structural survey revealed the full scale of the damage.
sentences.chinese: 结构检验揭示了实际受损程度。

sentences.english: I was shocked by the sheer scale (= very big scale ) of the destruction.
sentences.chinese: 破坏程度之大让我大为震惊。

sentences.english: Large firms benefit from economies of scale (= ways of saving money because they are big ) .
sentences.chinese: 大公司从规模经济中得益。

detailed_translations.chinese: 大小，规模；等级，级别；天平，磅秤；比例；刻度，标度；鳞
detailed_translations.english: the size or level of something, or the amount that something is happening
to climb to the top of something that is high and difficult to climb

name: shell
trans: n. 壳，贝壳；炮弹；外形 vi. 剥落；设定命令行解释器的位置 vt. 剥皮；炮轰

sentences.english: We ran for cover as shells dropped all around us.
sentences.chinese: 周围炮弹四处飞落，我们奔跑着寻找地方躲避。

sentences.english: an exploding mortar shell
sentences.chinese: 一枚爆炸的迫击炮弹

detailed_translations.english: a metal container, like a large bullet, which is full of an explosive substance and is fired from a large gun

detailed_translations.chinese: 剥落；设定命令行解释器的位置
detailed_translations.english: to remove something such as beans or nuts from a shell or  pod

name: skin
trans: n. 皮肤；外皮 vt. 剥皮 vi. 愈合；长皮

sentences.english: She had thick black hair and smooth dark skin.
sentences.chinese: 她一头浓密的黑发，皮肤黝黑光滑。

sentences.english: The skin on his hands was dry and rough.
sentences.chinese: 他手上的皮肤干燥粗糙。

detailed_translations.english: the natural outer layer of a person’s or animal’s body
to remove the skin from an animal, fruit, or vegetable

name: spines
trans: n. [解剖] 脊柱；棘状突起；体刺（spine的复数）

name: big
trans: adj. 大的；重要的；量大的 adv. 大量地；顺利；夸大地 n. (Big)人名；(土)比格

sentences.english: a big house
sentences.chinese: 大房子

sentences.english: I need a bigger desk.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一张大一点的桌子。

sentences.english: She had a big grin on her face.
sentences.chinese: 她脸上挂着大大的笑容。

sentences.english: a big increase in crime
sentences.chinese: 犯罪率的大幅上升

sentences.english: Los Angeles is the biggest city in California.
sentences.chinese: 洛杉矶是加利福尼亚最大的城市。

sentences.english: The garage isn’t big enough for two cars.
sentences.chinese: 这个车库不够大，停不下两辆汽车。

sentences.english: When they lose, they lose in a big way (=  to a large degree  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们要输就输得很惨。

sentences.english: There was this great big (=  extremely big  ) spider in the sink.
sentences.chinese: 洗涤槽里有只特大的蜘蛛。

detailed_translations.english: of more than average size or amount

name: ear
trans: n. 耳朵；穗；听觉；倾听 vi. （美俚）听见；抽穗 n. (Ear)人名；(柬)伊

sentences.english: She tucked her hair behind her ears.
sentences.chinese: 她把头发拢到耳朵背后。

detailed_translations.english: one of the organs on either side of your head that you hear with

name: long
trans: adj. 长的；长时间的；远的；长音的；（人）高的；持续的；冗长的；记得牢的；较大量的；远期（获利）的 adv. 长期地；（某事之前或之后）很久地；（时间名词后）整个时间；远地 n. 长时间；长音；远期证券；（服装的）长尺寸；长裤 v. 渴望，盼望 n. (Long) （美、英、爱）隆（人名）

sentences.english: He longed to see her again.
sentences.chinese: 到那里去要多长时间？

sentences.english: She longed for the chance to speak to him in private.
sentences.chinese: 她渴望有机会和他私下交谈。

sentences.chinese: 他们用泥涂满全身。

sentences.english: I dirty my trousers when I step on the mud.
sentences.chinese: 我一脚擩在烂泥里， 把裤子弄脏了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 泥；诽谤的话；无价值的东西
detailed_translations.english: wet earth that has become soft and sticky

name: past
trans: adj. 过去的，从前的，以往的；刚过去的，刚结束的；（动词）过去式的；完成的，结束的 n. 过去，昔日，往事；（某人）过去的经历（或事业）；（语法）过去时，（动词的）过去式 prep. 经过，路过；（指钟点）过，晚于，在......之后；在......的更远处，在另一边；多于，超过，越过 adv. 过，经过，从一侧到另一侧；（时间）过去，流逝；超过；以后，过后（与已知钟点相隔某段时间后）

sentences.english: Judging by her past performance, Jane should do very well.
sentences.chinese: 从以往的表现来看，简应该会干得很好。

sentences.english: From past experience she knew that it was no use arguing with him.
sentences.chinese: 根据过去的经验，她知道和他争论是没有用的。

sentences.english: Study some past exam papers to get an idea of the questions.
sentences.chinese: 仔细看看以前的一些考卷，了解一下考题。

sentences.english: It’s time she stopped living in the past (= thinking only about the past ) and began to think about her future.
sentences.chinese: 她不该再沉湎过去，应开始想想将来。

detailed_translations.english: done, used, or experienced before now
the time that existed before the present

name: pond
trans: n. 池塘；(the pond) （非正式）大西洋 v. 拦截（流水等液体）形成小湖 n. (Pond) （美、爱）庞德（人名）

sentences.english: The path descends to  the pond.
sentences.chinese: 小路下斜通到池塘。

sentences.english: This pond often catches in winter.
sentences.chinese: 这个池塘在冬天常常结冰。

sentences.english: Wild flowers and grasses rimmed the little pond.
sentences.chinese: 各种野花和野草环绕着这个小池塘。

detailed_translations.english: a small area of fresh water that is smaller than a lake, that is either natural or artificially made

name: trail
trans: n. 足迹；（跟踪某人的）踪迹；（尤指细长）一缕；（人或动物）排成的长队；（荒野）小路；特定路线；滑雪坡；（炮架的）架尾；（电影等的）预告片 v. 拖，拉；（尤指植物）蔓延；（尤指根据痕迹等）追踪；（在游戏、比赛中）落后；拖沓行走；（声音、喇叭）减弱；预告（影片、节目等）；喷注（泥釉） n. (Trail) （美）特雷尔（人名）

sentences.english: The trail led over Boulder Pass before descending to a lake.
sentences.chinese: 小路越过博尔德山口，然后向下通往湖边。

sentences.english: The bus left a trail of black smoke behind it.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车开过，留下一股黑烟。

sentences.english: Police trailed the gang for several days.
sentences.chinese: 警察跟踪了那个团伙好几天。

detailed_translations.english: a rough path across countryside or through a forest
to follow someone by looking for signs that they have gone in a particular direction

name: balloon
trans: n. 气球；热气球；球形大酒杯；对白圆圈；（非正式）蠢人；分期付款中最后一笔数目特大的还款；（非正式）大麻烦 v. 激增；突然长胖；膨胀；（把球）踢飞；乘热气球旅行 adj. 像气球般鼓起的 n. (Balloon) （美、印、泰、俄、巴）巴隆（人名）

sentences.english: The company’s debt has ballooned in the past year.
sentences.chinese: 在过去一年里，公司的债务激增。

detailed_translations.english: to suddenly become larger in amount
an object made of brightly coloured thin rubber, that is filled with air and used as a toy or decoration for parties

name: board
trans: n. 董事会；木板；甲板；膳食 vt. 上（飞机、车、船等）；用板盖上；给提供膳宿 vi. 寄宿 n. (Board)人名；(英、西)博德

sentences.english: a board meeting
sentences.chinese: 董事会会议

sentences.english: a board member
sentences.chinese: 董事会成员

detailed_translations.english: a group of people in a company or other organization who make the rules and important decisions

name: high
trans: adj. 高的；高级的；崇高的；高音调的 n. 高水平；天空；由麻醉品引起的快感；高压地带 adv. 高；奢侈地 n. (High)人名；(英)海伊

sentences.english: This is the highest mountain in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 这是日本最高的山。

sentences.english: The camp was surrounded by a high fence.
sentences.chinese: 营地四周围着高高的栅栏。

sentences.english: a ten-foot high statue
sentences.chinese: 10英尺高的雕像

sentences.chinese: 埃菲尔铁塔有多高？

sentences.chinese: 他把球高高地踢向空中，越过了人群。

detailed_translations.english: measuring a long distance from the bottom to the top
at or to a level high above the ground, the floor etc

name: hoop
trans: n. 箍；铁环；呼呼声 vt. 加箍于；包围 vi. 发呼呼声

sentences.chinese: 一个男孩滚着一个铁环朝他们走来。

detailed_translations.english: a large ring made of wood, metal, plastic etc
to surround with or as if with a hoop

name: low
trans: adj. 低的，浅的；卑贱的；粗俗的；消沉的 adv. 低声地；谦卑地，低下地 n. 低；低价；低点；牛叫声 vi. 牛叫 n. (Low)人名；(英、德)洛

sentences.english: a low wall/building/table
sentences.chinese: 矮墙 / 建筑物 / 桌子

sentences.english: low clouds
sentences.chinese: 低云

sentences.english: jobs with low status
sentences.chinese: 社会地位低下的职业

detailed_translations.english: not high or tall

trans: v. 滑动；平稳地走；悄悄移动；逐渐恶化；贬值；衰落；不知不觉陷入；不加理睬 n. 滑动；下跌； 幻灯片；变糟；滑梯；滑垒；坡道滑；雪崩；载物玻璃片；（机器或乐器的）滑动装置；发夹；轻便鞋

sentences.chinese: 他滑开玻璃柜的门。

to move smoothly over a surface while continuing to touch it, or to make something move in this way
a large structure with steps leading to the top of a long sloping surface which children can slide down

trans: num. 八；八个；第八；八岁；八点 adj. 八的 n. 八人划船队

sentences.chinese: 还有8天就到圣诞节了。

sentences.english: They woke at eight (= eight o’clock ).
sentences.chinese: 他们是8点钟醒的。

sentences.english: My parents died when I was eight (= eight years old ).

sentences.chinese: 她已婚，有四个孩子。

sentences.chinese: 刚过四点钟，他们就到了。

sentences.english: Luke will soon be four (= four years old ) .

trans: det. 许多 pron. 许多；许多人 adj. 许多的 n. 大多数人 n. (Many) （美、法、加、印）马尼（人名）

sentences.chinese: 在他的众多爱好中有饲养名马。

sentences.english: The printing press gave power to a few to change the world for the many.
sentences.chinese: 印刷机赋予了少数人为多数人改变世界的力量。

sentences.english: Not many expected Ferdinand to be such a success this season.
sentences.chinese: 预料到费迪南德在本赛季如此成功的人并不多。

trans: num. 数字6；六个；六个人（或物）一组；六岁；六点钟 n. (Six) （美、德）西克斯（人名）

sentences.chinese: 六个月前

sentences.english: She arrived just after six (= six o’clock ) .
sentences.chinese: 她六点刚过就到了。

sentences.chinese: 他六岁学拉小提琴。

detailed_translations.english: the number 6

trans: num. 十个，十 n. (Ten) （美、俄、加、德、荷、西、英）登（人名）

sentences.chinese: 雪已经连续下了10天了。

sentences.english: I need to be home by ten (= ten o’clock ) .
sentences.chinese: 我得在10点之前回家。

sentences.english: At the time, she was about ten (= ten years old ) .
sentences.chinese: 那时她10岁左右。

detailed_translations.english: the number 10

name: two
trans: n. 两个 adj. 两个的 num. 二

sentences.chinese: 请你们两个一组排好队。

detailed_translations.english: in groups of two people or things
the number 2

name: ate
trans: v. 吃（eat的过去式）

sentences.english: The boy ate several dishfuls of ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 那小男孩吃了好几满盘冰淇淋。

sentences.english: They cut the cake in two and ate half each.
sentences.chinese: 他们把蛋糕分成两块，每人吃半块。

sentences.english: He nibbled away the apple peel, then ate the flesh.
sentences.chinese: 他先慢慢地咬去苹果皮，然后再吃果肉。

name: goat
trans: n. 山羊；替罪羊（美俚）；色鬼（美俚）

sentences.english: The tiger sprang on the goat.
sentences.chinese: 老虎向山羊扑去。

sentences.english: The goat bunted the calf.
sentences.chinese: 山羊用角抵小牛。

sentences.english: They staked the goat in the back yard.
sentences.chinese: 他们把山羊拴在后院的木桩上。

detailed_translations.english: an animal that has horns on top of its head and long hair under its chin, and can climb steep hills and rocks. Goats live wild in the mountains or are kept as farm animals.

name: math
trans: n. 数学（等于mathematics） n. (Math)人名；(德)马特；(柬)马；(英)马思

sentences.english: Tim’s good at math and science.
sentences.chinese: 蒂姆的数学和自然科学很好。

sentences.chinese: 一组简单的数学题

sentences.chinese: 她在数学班学微积分。

sentences.english: a math test
sentences.chinese: 数学测验

detailed_translations.english: mathematics

trans: n. 难题；引起麻烦的人 adj. 成问题的；难处理的

sentences.english: She was older than me, but that wasn’t really a problem.
sentences.chinese: 她比我年长，不过那不算什么问题。

sentences.english: She gave us 20 mathematical problems to solve.
sentences.chinese: 她让我们解20道数学题。

detailed_translations.english: a situation that causes difficulties

sentences.english: She was treated by her local doctor.
sentences.chinese: 她由她的本区医生治疗。

sentences.english: I’d like to make an appointment to see Dr Pugh.
sentences.chinese: 我想预约看皮尤医生。

sentences.english: a Doctor of Law

detailed_translations.english: someone who is trained to treat people who are ill

name: firefighter
trans: n. 消防队员

sentences.english: When every molecule in your body tells you to run away from the burning building, as a firefighter you have to resist the urge, override it and plunge in.
sentences.chinese: 当你身体内每个细胞都告诉逃离失火的建筑物时，作为一名消防员，你必须克制这种冲动，超越它，投入火场进行战斗。

sentences.english: He mows lawns and gardens for half a dozen clients in Grafton, some of them family friends. And he is an active volunteer firefighter.
sentences.chinese: 他为格拉夫顿六户人家修剪草坪和花园，他们中一些是父母的朋友，此外他还是个积极的义务消防员。

sentences.english: Locally and from the state standpoint, we had some firefighter jobs that were in jeopardy, up in the hundreds.
sentences.chinese: 站在州政府的立场，我们有一些消防员在危险岗位工作，最多时有数百人。

name: nurse
trans: n. 护士；保姆；奶妈；防护树；保育虫；沙锥齿鲨 v. 照料，护理；当护士；调养；喂奶；吃奶；怀有；精心照料；喝；抱住；聚球 n. (Nurse) （美、爱）纳斯（人名）

sentences.chinese: 护士会来给你打针。

sentences.chinese: 学校的护士送萨拉回家。

sentences.english: a male nurse
sentences.chinese: 男护士

sentences.chinese: 高级护士

sentences.english: a student nurse (= someone who is learning to be a nurse )
sentences.chinese: 实习护士

sentences.chinese: 精神病院护士

sentences.chinese: 他一直在照顾一位年老的亲戚。

trans: n. 飞行员；领航员 adj. 试点的 v. 驾驶；领航；试用 n. (Pilot)人名；(意、印)皮洛特；(法)皮洛

sentences.english: an airline pilot
sentences.chinese: 航空公司飞行员

sentences.english: a fighter pilot
sentences.chinese: 战斗机驾驶员

sentences.english: The official report into the accident says that it was caused by pilot error (= a mistake by the pilot ) .
sentences.chinese: 那宗事故的官方报告称事故是由飞行员失误造成的。

sentences.english: The plan is to launch a pilot programme next summer.
sentences.chinese: 计划是在明年夏天实施一个试验性方案。

detailed_translations.english: someone who operates the controls of an aircraft or spacecraft
A pilot plan or a pilot project is one that is used to test an idea before deciding whether to introduce it on a larger scale
to guide an aircraft, spacecraft, or ship as its pilot

name: police officer
trans: n. 警官；警员

sentences.english: The police officer said your country [Pakistan] is not secure but I still prefer to live there. I love my country.
sentences.chinese: 警官说你们巴基斯坦现在也不安全，但是我仍然希望回到祖国去生活，我爱我的祖国。

sentences.english: The laws specify, for example, that the police officer administering a photo or live lineup should not know who the suspect is, and the witness should be told that the officer does not know.
sentences.chinese: 法律详细规定的有，如，警官在处理照片或一列待指认嫌疑人时不能先入为主地知道谁是嫌犯，而目击证人在指证时也应被告知，警察不知道谁是嫌犯。

sentences.english: The police officer led him to a beautiful garden with lots of grass, pretty flowers, and manicured hedges.
sentences.chinese: 警官带着他到一个很美的花园，里面有很多的草，很多的花，修剪好的树坪。

detailed_translations.english: a member of the police

name: airplane
trans: n. 飞机

sentences.english: The airplane cracked up in landing.
sentences.chinese: 这架飞机在着陆时坠毁。

sentences.english: The new airplane flies at twice the speed of sound.
sentences.chinese: 这架新式飞机以两倍于音速的速度飞行。

sentences.english: We beamed the airplane down safely.
sentences.chinese: 我们给飞机导航使它安全降落。

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle that flies through the air and has one or more engines

name: chain
trans: n. 链；束缚；枷锁 vt. 束缚；囚禁；用铁链锁住

sentences.english: ...a large supermarket chain.
sentences.chinese: …一家大型连锁超市。

detailed_translations.english: a number of shops, hotels, cinemas etc owned or managed by the same company or person

name: flower
trans: n. 花；精华；开花植物 vi. 成熟，发育；开花；繁荣；旺盛 vt. 使开花；用花装饰 n. (Flower)人名；(英)弗劳尔

sentences.english: a lovely rose bush with delicate pink flowers
sentences.chinese: 一簇开着娇嫩的粉红色花朵的美丽蔷薇

sentences.english: fields full of beautiful wild flowers
sentences.chinese: 开满美丽野花的田野

sentences.english: It was May, and the apple trees were all in flower.
sentences.chinese: 那是个5月，苹果树开满了花。

detailed_translations.english: a coloured or white part that a plant or tree produces before fruit or seeds

name: hat
trans: n. 帽子 vt. 给……戴上帽子 vi. 供应帽子；制造帽子 n. (Hat)人名；(中)核(广东话·威妥玛)

sentences.english: Maria was wearing a beautiful new hat.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚戴着一顶漂亮的新帽子。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing that you wear on your head

name: love
trans: n. 爱；爱情；喜好；（昵称）亲爱的；爱你的；心爱的人；钟爱之物；零分 v. 爱恋（某人）；关爱；喜欢（某物或某事）；忠于 n. (Love) （英、菲、瑞、美）洛夫（人名）

sentences.english: I love you, Tracy.
sentences.chinese: 我爱你，特雷西。

sentences.english: He was the only man she had ever loved.
sentences.chinese: 他是她唯一爱过的男人。

sentences.english: What these kids need is love and support.
sentences.chinese: 这些孩子需要的是关心和支持。

detailed_translations.english: to have a strong feeling of  affection  for someone, combined with sexual attraction

sentences.chinese: 太乱了！

sentences.chinese: 对不起——这里有些乱。

sentences.chinese: 我回到家时，屋子里一片狼藉。

sentences.chinese: 如果你答应不把厨房搞得乱七八糟，你可以去做甜饼。

trans: n. 沙；沙地；沙洲；沙滩；沙子 vt. 撒沙于；以沙掩盖；用砂纸等擦平或磨光某物；使撒沙似地布满；给…掺沙子 vi. 被沙堵塞 n. (Sand)人名；(英、德、意、芬、罗、捷、挪)桑德；(瑞典)桑德；(法)桑

sentences.english: a mixture of sand and cement
sentences.chinese: 沙和水泥的混合物

sentences.english: I have sand in my shoe.
sentences.chinese: 我的鞋里有沙子。

detailed_translations.english: a substance consisting of very small pieces of rocks and minerals, that forms beaches and deserts

detailed_translations.chinese: 撒沙于；以沙掩盖；用砂纸等擦平或磨光某物；使撒沙似地布满；给…掺沙子
detailed_translations.english: to make a surface smooth by rubbing it with  sandpaper  or using a special piece of equipment

name: wind
trans: n. 风；呼吸；气味；卷绕 vt. 缠绕；上发条；使弯曲；吹号角；绕住或缠住某人 vi. 缠绕；上发条；吹响号角 n. (Wind)人名；(英、德、瑞典)温德

sentences.english: The wind blew from the northeast.
sentences.chinese: 风从东北方向吹来。

detailed_translations.english: moving air, especially when it moves strongly or quickly in a current

name: coat
trans: n. 外套 vt. 覆盖…的表面 n. (Coat)人名；(法)科阿

sentences.english: Billy! Put your coat on , it’s cold outside!
sentences.chinese: 比利！穿上外套，外面很冷！

sentences.english: The kids took off their coats and threw them on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们脱下外套扔在地板上。

sentences.english: I need a new winter coat .
sentences.chinese: 我需要一件新的冬衣。

sentences.english: The lab assistants wear long white coats.
sentences.chinese: 实验室助手穿着白色的长外套。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing with long sleeves that is worn over your clothes to protect them or to keep you warm
to cover something with a thin layer of something else

name: mittens
trans: n. 棒球手套，拳击手套；手套；连指手套（mitten的复数，常用复数）

name: pants
trans: n. 裤子

sentences.english: She was wearing dark blue pants and a white sweater.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着深蓝色长裤和白色毛衣。

sentences.english: a pair of pants
sentences.chinese: 一件内裤

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing that covers you from your waist to your feet and has a separate part for each leg

name: scarf
trans: n. 围巾；嵌接，嵌接处；头巾领巾 vt. 披嵌接；用围巾围 n. (Scarf)人名；(英)斯卡夫 [ 复数 scarfs或scarves ]

sentences.english: Hey, your scarf is slipping off.
sentences.chinese: 喂， 你的围巾快掉了。

sentences.english: The scarf flapped her face.
sentences.chinese: 围巾轻拂着她的脸。

sentences.english: She muffled her throat with a scarf.
sentences.chinese: 她用围巾围住脖子。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of cloth that you wear around your neck, head, or shoulders, especially to keep warm

name: sled
trans: n. 雪橇 vi. 乘雪橇；用雪橇运 vt. 用摘棉机摘；用雪橇运

sentences.english: She tumbled over a sled.
sentences.chinese: 她被雪橇绊了一跤。

sentences.english: When his sled broke down, he repaired it.
sentences.chinese: 当他的雪橇坏掉时，他自己维修。

sentences.english: The hut stands at the foot of a near vertical wall of rock in an icy fjord in the high Arctic, a week away by dog sled from the nearest human settlement.
sentences.chinese: 小屋坐落在高纬度北极地区峡湾边一座几乎是垂直的山岩下，从最近的有人居住的地方到此地，狗拉的雪橇要走一个星期。

detailed_translations.english: A sled is the same as a

name: winter
trans: n. 冬季；年岁；萧条期 vi. 过冬 adj. 冬天的；越冬的 n. (Winter)人名；(英、德、匈、罗、捷、西、芬、瑞典、法)温特

sentences.english: I like winter because we play soccer!
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢冬天因为我们踢足球！

sentences.english: Well, the worst of the winter should be over.
sentences.chinese: 不过，冬天最糟糕的一段日子总该过去了。

sentences.english: Do you like summer? Yes, but I like winter better.
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢夏天吗？是的，但是我更喜欢冬天。

detailed_translations.english: the season after autumn and before spring, when the weather is coldest

name: fun
trans: vi. 开玩笑（fun 的第三人称单数）（非正式）

sentences.english: There’s plenty of fun for all the family.
sentences.chinese: 可以让全家人玩得很开心。

sentences.english: The children were having so much fun, I hated to call them inside.
sentences.chinese: 小孩子玩得很开心，我不忍心把他们叫进来。

detailed_translations.english: an experience or activity that is very enjoyable and exciting

name: around
trans: adv. 在四周；朝对立面；到处；漫无目的地；在附近；大约；围绕；以圆周计算；现有；转弯 prep. 围绕；在那边；绕着；同……一致；到处；以（已提及物）为中心；迂回

sentences.english: What an inspiration she was to all around her!
sentences.chinese: 她对于她周围所有的人是一种多么大的鼓舞!

sentences.english: All those around him looked at him with amazement.
sentences.chinese: 周围的人都对他投射出惊异的眼光。

name: backward
trans: adj. 向后的；倒退的；（人）智力迟钝的；落后的；（场地位置）线后的 adv. 向后地；往回地；回溯（过去）；每况愈下地；前后反过来（等于 backwards） n. 后面（或过去）的部分 n. (Backward) （美、俄）巴克克华尔德（人名）

sentences.english: She went without a backward glance.
sentences.chinese: 她头也不回地走了。

sentences.english: He works backward, building a house from the top downward.
sentences.chinese: 他倒着干活，从上往下盖房子。

detailed_translations.english: looking or facing in the direction that is behind you
If you do something backward, you do it in the opposite way to the usual way

name: forward
trans: adv. 向前地；按顺序地；迈向成功；进入显著的位置；向将来；提前；在（或向）船头 adj. 向前的；（交通工具）前面的；早的；迅速的；与将来有关的；鲁莽的；预先的 v. 发送；转寄；促进；运送 n. （运动队的）前锋；（货币的）期货协议 n. (Forward) （美、加、英、澳）福沃德（人名）

sentences.english: He leaned forward , his elbows resting on the table.
sentences.chinese: 他身体前倾，胳膊肘撑在桌子上。

sentences.english: The crowd surged forwards.
sentences.chinese: 人群向前涌去。

sentences.english: The next scene takes the story forward five years.
sentences.chinese: 下一个场面是描述故事中五年后的情况。

detailed_translations.english: towards a place or position that is in front of you

name: over
trans: adv. 倒下；翻转；穿过；完全覆盖；以上；大于；再；结束；改变；完毕；仔细地 prep. 在……上面；从……上方；穿越；在……的另一边；在……的远端；从……落下；遍及；多于；在……期间；渡过；由于；关于；利用；通过；声音大于；高于；级别在……之上；优先于；超过 n. （板球）一轮投球 adj. 倒下的；折起来的；结束的；剩下的 v. 越过 n. (Over) （美、英、得）奥韦尔（人名）

sentences.english: Will you be home over the summer vacation?
sentences.chinese: 暑假期间你在家吗？

sentences.english: Over a period of ten years he stole a million pounds from the company.
sentences.chinese: 他在10年间从公司偷走了100万英镑。

sentences.english: Can we talk about this over dinner?
sentences.chinese: 我们能否边吃饭边谈这个问题？

detailed_translations.english: during

name: through
trans: prep. 穿过，从一端到另一端；断开，洞穿；穿行；越过；透过……看到；隔着……听到；一直到底； 自始至终；从头到尾检查；通过（障碍、阶段或测试）；直至；经由；凭借 adv. 从一端到另一端；通过；从头至尾；通过； 直达；径直；（电话）接通着；彻底 adj. 直达的；联运的，全程的；直通的；贯穿的，过境的；对穿的，双向的；与楼两对面通透的；进入下一轮的；完结的；（使用）完成，结束；（关系）了结，断绝

sentences.english: How many working days were lost through sickness last year?
sentences.chinese: 去年因为员工生病损失了多少个工作日？

detailed_translations.english: because of something

name: food
trans: n. 食物；养料

sentences.english: The restaurant serves good food at affordable prices.
sentences.chinese: 那家餐厅物美价廉。

sentences.english: I love Italian food, especially pasta.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢意大利食物，尤其是面食。

sentences.english: He was told to cut down on salty and fatty foods.
sentences.chinese: 他被告知要少吃过咸和油腻的食物。

detailed_translations.chinese: 食物，食品；养料，精神食粮
detailed_translations.english: things that people and animals eat, such as vege-tables or meat

name: my
trans: pron. 我的 int. 哎呀（表示惊奇等）；喔唷 n. (My)人名；(越)美；(老、柬)米

sentences.english: All my friends do not smoke.
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友并不全都吸烟。

sentences.english: Then you must be my cousin.
sentences.chinese: 那么你一定是我的远亲了。

name: your
trans: pron. 你的，你们的

sentences.english: You should keep in with your colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 你应当与你的同事友好相处。

sentences.english: You should not deprecate your own worth.
sentences.chinese: 你不应该贬低你自己的价值。
